channel.title: Posts on NTUMito
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on NTUMito

item.title: KaTeX support
item.description:
This article showed examples for KaTeX math typesetting.

Examples are taken from TiddlyWiki5.

item.title: Hugo Page Content
item.description:
This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

As well as some shorcodes for Hugo.
